name: Crystals of Time (itch) (CaptainCookiie, Hocke, Wraygo)
description:
In this sidescrolling, 2D Platformer adventure the player takes over the role of an archeologist looking for Kronos' powerful time-crystal.

Beat the levels by traversing obstacles with your movement abilities and occasionally solving riddles with the help of a magical shift between two timelines. Stop Kronos by switching between two timelines and solving all the riddles in time to stop his evil plan.

This game is a group project made by four gamedesign - students in their third semester.  

Have fun playing and feel free to leave some feedback! :D

Side note: In-game language is german
